metadata.title: ELEXIM SK | EV Charging Infrastructure
metadata.description: Complete e-mobility solutions in Slovakia - design, supply, installation and maintenance of EV charging stations.

hero.subtitle: We supply and install EV charging stations. From home wallboxes to public DC fast chargers - complete turnkey solutions.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive care for your charging infrastructure
services.description: From initial consultation to long-term service - we take care of everything

consulting.title: Design & Consulting
consulting.description: We analyze your needs, design optimal solutions and prepare complete project documentation including permits.

delivery.title: Equipment Supply
delivery.description: We supply proven AC and DC charging stations from renowned manufacturers - MyBox for homes and businesses, Alpitronic for public charging.

installation.title: Installation
installation.description: Professional installation by certified technicians. Complete electrical work including panel modifications and commissioning.

service.title: Service & Maintenance
service.description: Regular maintenance, fast repairs and remote diagnostics. Service contracts with guaranteed response times.

integration.title: Integration & Software
integration.description: Cloud platform connectivity, PV integration, dynamic load management and billing systems.

support.title: Technical Support
support.description: Hotline for problem resolution, operator training and regular reporting on charging infrastructure usage.

cta.title: Need advice?
cta.description: Contact us for a free consultation

products.title: Charging Stations
products.subtitle: Wide portfolio for every need
products.description: From home wallboxes to powerful DC fast chargers

mybox.title: MyBox
mybox.subtitle: Czech quality for e-mobility
mybox.description: The charging station brand of the ELEXIM Group. All products are designed and manufactured in the Czech Republic with focus on quality, safety and modern design.

czech.title: Czech Made
czech.description: Developed and manufactured in CZ since 2017

trusted.title: Trusted by Brands
trusted.description: ČEZ, ŠKODA AUTO, PRE, Volvo and more

ac.title: AC Charging Stations
ac.subtitle: AC charging up to 22 kW
ac.description: Ideal for homes, apartment buildings and company parking lots. Overnight or workday charging.

dc.title: DC Fast Chargers
dc.subtitle: DC charging 50-400 kW
dc.description: For public charging stations, gas stations and highway rest areas. Charging in minutes.

cta.title: Not sure which to choose?
cta.description: We'll help you find the ideal solution

whyUs.title: Why ELEXIM?
whyUs.subtitle: Experience, expertise and reliability
whyUs.description: We are part of the Czech company ELEXIM a.s. based in Kroměříž. Since 1999, we have been building a reputation as a reliable partner in electrical engineering, special applications and e-mobility. Our MyBox charging stations are developed and manufactured in the Czech Republic.
highlights: Headquarters in Kroměříž, branches in Slovakia and Hungary
Three divisions: Electrical Engineering, Special Applications, E-Mobility
Official distributor of ABB (since 2000) and Schneider Electric (since 2006)

experience.title: 25+ Years of Experience
experience.description: ELEXIM Group has been in the market since 1999

expert.title: Certified Experts
expert.description: Team of experienced technicians and engineers

complete.title: Complete Service
complete.description: From design to service - all from one place

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Part of the international ELEXIM Group
about.description: ELEXIM SK s.r.o. is the Slovak branch of the Czech company ELEXIM a.s., which has been in the market since 1999. We specialize in comprehensive e-mobility solutions.

group.title: ELEXIM Group
group.description: The parent company ELEXIM a.s. based in Kroměříž has three main divisions - E-mobility, Special Applications and Electrical Engineering. We operate in 5 countries.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We'll be happy to help you design your charging infrastructure
contact.description: Fill out the form or contact us directly. We'll respond within 24 hours.

footer.description: Complete e-mobility solutions in Slovakia. Part of the international ELEXIM Group.
